attributes.action: Change from current Greenwich Meantime to GMT+1 to reduce energy consumption and reduce carbon emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With all the talk about reducing emissions and our rising demand for energy, a simple way to achieve an immeadiate reduction would be to align ourselves to most of our business partners in the EEC by changing our time to GMT+1 and thus meaning we would turn on our home lighting an hour later in the evenings.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
